segments.text: What did you do at that company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I helped my boss organize some grand ceremonies and maintained close relations with newspapers , magazines , the radio and the TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If a consumer complains about the quality of your products , what will you do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If I am not in the service center , I will assist others in resolving the consumer complaints . And pass the criticism on to the relevant department .
segments.speaker: S2
